page.title: 17KIRKSTEAD ABBEY
page.content: KIRKSTEAD ABBEY WAS DISOLVED BY HENRY VIII OVER 300 YEARS BEFORE WOODHALL SPA CAME INTO EXISTANCE,THOUGH A LITTLE CHAPEL WAS LEFT FOR THE LOCAL PEOPLE(ST LEONARDS IN THE FIELDS). ABOUT 25 YEARS AGO THERE WAS A RAILWAY RUNNING THROUGH WOODHALL SPA. THE STATION WAS BEHIND THE BROADWAY SHOPS , IT NO LONGER EXISTS. IN 1811 AFTER PARKINSON WENT BUST, THE SHAFT WHICH HE DUG FILLED WITH WATER AND OVER FLOWED INTO A DITCH.A SICK COW DRUNK THE WATER AND RECOVERED .THE WATER WAS FOUND TO CONTAIN IODINE AND BROMINE.IN 1887 THE HEDAY HAD COME AND FOR NEARLY 97 YEARS IT WAS EXSTENSIVELY.THEN IN 1984 IT WAS CLOSED DOWN.
